extendedInfo.description: Learn how to increase lean muscle mass, shatter weak points and improve overall shape in unconventional ways with individual body part exercise programs designed by experienced fitness professional Jeffrey Beck. The free features include a resting metabolic rate calculator to pinpoint daily caloric intake recommendations for healthy weight loss or weight gain and exercise logs for recording daily workout routines and tracking progress. Also included as a free feature is The Dylan Project, which showcases workout tips and highlights of a heart transplant recipient's inspirational journey. This app also includes professional nutrition and training guidance for beginners just starting out and advanced fitness enthusiasts who need help formulating a training and diet regimen specific for individual needs. The exercise program portion includes video demonstrations as well as instructions on how to properly perform each unique exercise plus the correct amount of sets, reps and resting time to maximize gains. If time constraints are an issue, this app also includes an intense home workout and abdominal sculpting routine that doesn't require any equipment and can be done in minutes. Download now and start building muscle today!

reviews.title: Exercise Guru
reviews.comment: A great app that everybody needs to have.
reviews.author: Karen Harden

reviews.title: Loads of info
reviews.comment: Great App with plenty of info on all aspects of training
reviews.author: Rich Phill

reviews.title: Great fitness APP!!
reviews.comment: This app is fantastic! Very easy to use.. Great exercise ideas and I love the log! I also thought The Dillon Project was really cool :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite Useful!
reviews.comment: I like the exercise log feature! It is very convenient for keeping track of my workouts. I also did the Bustin\' Biceps program today and was really pleased!
reviews.author: Torie Farnsworth

reviews.title: my favorite fitness app!
reviews.comment: I love Jeffery beck fitness! Thanks for giving me a great work out!
reviews.author: Jaimie Riding
